title: Need help identifying a display font with art nouveau style image and type. Used for fashion purposes possibly 1950’s or 1960’s.
author: Bob Gray

comments.content:
See [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826050520/http:/abfonts.freehostia.com/index.htm). You can't access subpages directly, so click on "list of all fonts" in the 3rd paragraph. click the Author tab at the top, then find the ViaFaceDon fonts under Dick Pape's name.

Originally 'Via Face' from the Mecanorma catalog (pre-digital).
